title: Promise Me
description: From NYT and USA Today bestselling author Cora Brent....an epic novel of heartbreak, desire and the healing power of love. Promise Talbot needs to escape. Forced into a polygamous marriage to a sadistic man, she grabs a desperate opportunity to flee his clutches. And falls into the world of the Defiant Motorcycle Club. Grayson Mercado seethes with the injustice of a long imprisonment for a crime he did not commit. Finally free, he is trying to make a life among his new brothers. Everything changes when a battered young woman approaches him, begging for help. Promise and Grayson couldnâ€™t be more different. But the collision of passion and danger will spark a love written in their fates. Full length novel contains adult language, mature emotional themes, and explicit content. Not intended for those under the age of 18.
